alert.note: Alert for Lee; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 12:16PM EDT until July 22 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Turner County in south central Georgia... Central Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1216 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Cordele to 12 miles southeast of Desoto to Leesburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Albany, Worth, Warwick, Stocks, Amboy, Century, Sibley, Byne Crossroads, Philema, Dakota, Doles, Mossy Dell and Oakfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
